name: ALLIANCE FOR RURAL HOSPITAL ACCESS
description: Coalition of Rural Referral Centers and Sole Community Hospitals
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Medicare reimbursement for rural referral centers and sole community hospitals.
Amendments to Section 340B of the Public Health Service Act to gain eligibility for rural referral centers and sole community hospitals in the federal discount drug purchasing program.
